title: Natural Expressions
description: Capture genuine emotions by photographing kids at their own eye level.

title: With Favourite Toy
description: Let them play with a cherished toy to help them relax.

title: First Love Vibes
description: Ask them to recall how they felt when they first met — natural emotion follows.

title: Arm on Chest
description: A warm pose with her arm on his chest — great for close-ups.

title: Shoulder Glance
description: Ask her to look over her shoulder — adds charm from a new angle.

title: Hands by Face
description: Experiment with soft hand placements near the face, no flat palms.

title: Confident Arms Crossed
description: Arms crossed and upright posture show strength and ease.

title: Hands in Pockets
description: Relaxed stance with hands in pockets gives a casual vibe.

title: Family on Bed
description: Capture family lying casually together — great indoors or out.

title: With Pets
description: Include pets in the family frame — it adds emotion and energy.

title: First Dance
description: Capture the couple mid-spin or a quiet close-up during their first dance.

title: Soft Recline
description: Model lies down relaxed — can be on grass, bed, or lounge.
